Body:
sim_pattern = ci_pattern.CIPatternNonUniform(normalization=500.0, regions=[
    (0, 1, 0, 1)], row_slope=-0.01)
non_uniform_charge_region = sim_pattern.simulate_region(region_dimensions=(
    5, 3), ci_seed=1)
non_uniform_charge_region = np.round(non_uniform_charge_region, 1)
assert (non_uniform_charge_region == np.array([[500.0, 500.0, 500.0], [
    496.5, 496.5, 496.5], [494.5, 494.5, 494.5], [493.1, 493.1, 493.1], [
    492.0, 492.0, 492.0]])).all()
